qas.question: What was Greece accused of covering up the extent of?
What prompted the allegation of Greece's covering up its budget deficit?
Who voted in favor of an official investigation of the accusations?
When did the Parliament vote in favor of an investigation?
What did a former member of the Hellenic Statistical Authority say the deficit had been inflated to justify?
What was Greece accused of being transparent about?
What silenced the allegation of Greece's covering up its budget deficit?
Who voted against an official investigation of the accusations?
When did the Parliament vote in opposition of an investigation?
What did a former member of the Hellenic Statistical Authority say the deficit had been decreased to justify?

context: Greece was accused of trying to cover up the extent of <a0_0><b5_0>its massive budget deficit<b5_0/><a0_0/> in the wake of the global financial crisis. The allegation was prompted by the <a1_0><b6_0>massive revision<b6_0/><a1_0/> of the 2009 budget deficit forecast by the new PASOK government elected in October 2009, from "6–8%" (estimated by the previous New Democracy government) to 12.7% (later revised to 15.7%). However, the accuracy of the revised figures has also been questioned, and in <a3_0><b8_0>February 2012<b8_0/><a3_0/> the <a2_0><b7_0>Hellenic Parliament<b7_0/><a2_0/> voted in favor of an official investigation following accusations by a former member of the Hellenic Statistical Authority that the deficit had been artificially inflated in order to justify <a4_0><b9_0>harsher austerity measures<b9_0/><a4_0/>.
